Reviews.Title: “bad ''hotel''”
Reviews.Author: djk08
Reviews.Content: Firstly you cant say its a hotel..they put as in a wooden ''bungalow''!They clean up every day but thats not make the difference unfortunely.You are tired to communicate..you can not have a hotel as you say and speak only italian!Then it had great acoustic!you could every single noise from 2 next rooms and of course the opposite..The breakfast poor and without fantasy cheap things from the super market and no polite the guy in the reseption.Its not possible a guest to ask for salt and a whole hotel you say that there is no salt!That a lie say you are boring or something!Unprofessional first time i saw a hotel to have closed the door and no reseption at night!!!No mini bar..Ohh and it is far from the centre i knew that..but i didnt expect that the delay will be mostly from the bus..only few routes.The hotel is only for locals who have a ''illegal'' girlfriend and businessmen who want to speak for hours by skype because it has free internet access!believe me i heard them clearly every single conversession unfortunelly after a very long day and walking in Rome..

Reviews.Title: “I didn't like it”
Reviews.Author: mary_kat58
Reviews.Content: The room was old and dirty. The bathroom was awful. We stayed two nights. We had arranged for 3 nights, but we left earlier. They didn;t charge us for the 3rd night. The breakfast was nice.

Reviews.Title: “not coming back”
Reviews.Author: Erica06
Reviews.Content: we ordered this hotel after checking reviews and seeing photos almost 2 months beffore the stay , that's why we were shocked to receive a dark little hidden room. We refused to get it , and the clark made some nerveus phone calls , i had to speak with the manager and insisted to receive a diffrent room as was shown in the hotel website. After all, we got a nicer room , but it was also so little , not a normal place to store your clothes , so for 3 days they stayed in the suitcase. The breakfast is o.k and it is good you have a free parking place. The hotel situated a bit far from rome center, you have to take a bus to the closest metro and than contineu with metro, but it is close to the round road and exits from Rome. We do not recomend .

Reviews.Title: “Cheap but dirty”
Reviews.Author: Melina210
Reviews.Content: I would not suggest this hotel, because the rooms are dirty. It is very old, and the rooms are not nice.
